Docs.param: Options to control the reader behavior during parsing.
Docs.summary: Parses a sequence as UTF-8-encoded text representing a single JSON value into a .
Docs.returns: A JsonDocument representation of the JSON value.
Docs.remarks:
The may be used for the entire lifetime of the JsonDocument object, and the caller must ensure that the data therein does not change during the object's lifetime.
Because the input is considered to be text, a UTF-8 Byte-Order-Mark (BOM) must not be present.
Docs.exception: does not represent a valid single JSON value.
